common.title: VGReborn - Download and Play Vainglory Together
common.serverConnectionError: Server connection failed, please check your network

home.joinDescription: Based on <1>VPN+MITM</1> technology to automatically bind game state to VGReborn, bringing Ranked, Recruiting, Friends, Punishment etc.
home.info5v5: To reduce 5v5 queue splitting, VGReborn <1>does not support 5v5 Casual</1>

installCert.title: Install & Trust Certificate
installCert.desc2: Go to Settings -> Profile Downloaded, install the mitmproxy certificate.
installCert.desc3: Go to Settings -> General -> About -> Certificate Trust Settings, enable full trust for mitmproxy.

installVpn.title: Install WireGuard
installVpn.desc1: No App version yet. Please use WireGuard from App Store/Google Play.
installVpn.desc2: <0>Download WireGuard Config</0> (This is your identity token)
installVpn.desc3: Open WireGuard, add tunnel from file.
installVpn.desc4: Toggle switch to connect/disconnect. (Only game traffic is tunneled)

startGame.title: Start Game
startGame.desc: You have joined VGReborn. Game state will sync automatically.

downloadGame.title: Download Game
downloadGame.desc2: Use APKPure or XAPKS Installer to install.

createRoom.title: How to Create Room
createRoom.desc:
Matchmaking is based on name prefix. VGReborn syncs automatically.
Code Rules:

public.title: Public Room
public.desc: Code represents Elo. Priority matching with similar Elo. 1600+ is Draft. Default is 1200.

private.title: Private Room
private.desc: Only same code can match. Must have full party to start.

download.title: Download
download.note1: Currently only supports East Asia server
download.note2: Do not modify the config file

login.title: VGReborn Login
login.authDesc: Authorize platform to capture game state for binding and matchmaking.

error.agree: Please agree to Terms of Service

1.title: 1. Overview
1.content: VGReborn is a 3rd party matchmaking enhancement platform for Vainglory CE.

2.title: 2. MITM Technology
2.content: To implement auto ID recognition, stats tracking, and room state capture, VGReborn uses VPN + MITM technology. Clicking 'Agree' authorizes the platform to intercept and read specific encrypted packets between the game client and server.

3.title: 3. Data Collection & Privacy
3.content: The platform only collects data necessary for matchmaking, including but not limited to: Player ID, Rank Score, Game State. We promise not to collect private device information or other network traffic unrelated to this service.

4.title: 4. User Conduct
4.content: Users must abide by fair play principles. Any malicious attacks, data tampering, or frequent malicious refusal of matches will result in account ban or penalty.

5.title: 5. Disclaimer
5.content: This platform is a 3rd party unofficial service, unrelated to Superevil Megacorp. Users bear the risk of any account abnormalities, device security risks, or connection instability caused by using this platform.

updateHandle.title: Change Nickname
updateHandle.subtitle: Set your display name in VGReborn
